channel.title: Vps help
channel.description:
OK well I've wanted to have my own private server for a while now, ive edited my own source and now i want to try and play with some friends on it.
I've not really known much about virtual private servers so naturally before paying out $30 and not knowing what i'm going to get I've searched for a free trial.
i found a 7 day free trial at www.cloudsigma.com, signed up downloaded TIGHTVNC and started to log into my server..
So my problem is, dispite everything being slow the security settings are rediculous, it took me about 20 minuites to get to the java website unblocking all the sites as i went along and then it won't let me download the file i want.
[IMG]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg77/smallkid176/server.png[/img]
so can anyone tell me, is this the case with all VPS's and is there anyway to undo it. or is this a simple case of you get what you pay for, and once i pay for a VPS i will get one that runs faster & doesn't have ridiculous settings?
Any kind natured responses would be appreciated.

item.title: Vps help
item.dc:creator: @Jake2008 Jake2008
item.description:
@Jake2008 wrote:

baddy351:

Ahem look at m post and search “ULtiMATE VPS GUIDE” I think it is called. It will tell you how

I’ve read this guide before i got the free trial, it has nothing to do with security settings on it.

Read full topic

item.title: Vps help
item.dc:creator: @Jake2008 Jake2008
item.description:
@Jake2008 wrote:

OK well I’ve wanted to have my own private server for a while now, ive edited my own source and now i want to try and play with some friends on it.

I’ve not really known much about virtual private servers so naturally before paying out $30 and not knowing what i’m going to get I’ve searched for a free trial.

i found a 7 day free trial at www.cloudsigma.com, signed up downloaded TIGHTVNC and started to log into my server…

So my problem is, dispite everything being slow the security settings are rediculous, it took me about 20 minuites to get to the java website unblocking all the sites as i went along and then it won’t let me download the file i want.

server.png816×667

so can anyone tell me, is this the case with all VPS’s and is there anyway to undo it. or is this a simple case of you get what you pay for, and once i pay for a VPS i will get one that runs faster & doesn’t have ridiculous settings?

Any kind natured responses would be appreciated.
